Tasks.Author: dbsic211
Tasks.Title: Calculate A+B
Tasks.Description: You are learning addition. Unfortunately, you don't have enough fingers to add up large numbers. Write a program to help you calculate A+B.
Tasks.INPUT: The only line of input contains two integers A and B, separated by a space. (−100,000≤A,B≤100,000)

Tasks.Author: dbsic211
Tasks.Title: Calculate A-B
Tasks.Description: You are learning addition. Unfortunately, you don't have enough fingers to add up large numbers. Write a program to help you calculate A+B.
Tasks.Format:
The only line of input contains two integers A and B, separated by a space. (−100,000≤A,B≤100,000)
Output a single integer: A+B.
